sections.heading: No stopping or standing within one-half mile of O'Hare International Airport
sections.text: Except where permitted, a person operating a motor vehicle shall not stop or stand the person's vehicle on a shoulder of a highway along traffic routes within a one-half mile radius of: (1) the eastern entrance to O'Hare I

sections.heading: Installation of automated traffic safety systems; enforcement
sections.text: The Authority shall install and maintain automated traffic safety systems along traffic routes within a one-half mile radius of: (1) the eastern entrance to O'Hare International Airport; and (2) the intersection of Interstate 90 and Inte

sections.heading: Recorded image. An automated traffic safety system that produces a recorded image of a motor vehicle's violation of this Act shall be designed to obtain a clear recorded image of the vehicle and the vehicle's license plate
sections.text: The recorded image must also display the time, date, and location of the vio

sections.heading: Fines; notice. A person who violates this Act shall be subject to a $100 fine for each offense
sections.text: Proceeds from fines shall be deposited into the State Police Law Enforcement Administration Fund.

sections.heading: Rules. The Authority shall adopt rules necessary to implement and administer this Act.
